item.title: Hands-On: Mobile AI with Gemma - iOS, Android
item.description: In our previous post, Mobile On-device AI: Smarter and Faster Private Apps, we explored the fundamentals of running AI locally on mobile devices. Now, it’s time to get hands-on and see this technology in action! This practical guide walks you through implementing mobile on-device AI using Google’s powerful Gemma model family, including the cutting-edge Gemma 3n. You’ll learn to deploy these models across iOS, Android, and web platforms using industry-standard frameworks.
